items.sentence: Why are you so dressed up? Where are you going?
Tom wants to take everyone\'s picture tomorrow.
Tell Tom I don\'t know where he parked his car.
Are you going back to the beach this afternoon?
I want to believe that everything\'s all right.
You\'re going to be late for work, aren\'t you?
You\'re going to explain it to us, aren\'t you?
You\'re having a pretty good time, aren\'t you?
Tom\'s house is on the other side of the river.
I\'ve been in love with you since kindergarten.
I\'ve been looking at the information you sent.
It\'s not what he said, but the way he said it.
It looks like Tom doesn\'t know how to do that.
My knowledge of French doesn\'t amount to much.
Do you think I don\'t know how to speak French?
Tom always complains about the way I do things.
Tom probably should\'ve asked Mary to help him.
Have you ever assembled a computer by yourself?
Have you ever borrowed money from your company?
Tom didn\'t seem to pay much attention to Mary.
Tom didn\'t show up until the meeting was over.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary what was going to happen.
Which do you like better, this one or that one?
Whoever wants to join our club will be welcome.
Why are there no windows in airplane bathrooms?
Tom has finally achieved what he set out to do.
Tom has gone on dates with both Mary and Alice.
Tom has helped us to make some tough decisions.
Tom didn\'t have Mary\'s permission to do that.
I still can\'t believe you and Tom got married.
I still think it\'s unlikely that Tom will win.
I still think that it\'s unlikely Tom will win.
Don\'t you think we should send for the doctor?
The scar on your chin isn\'t at all noticeable.
What\'s your favorite thing in the whole world?
Tom drove his father\'s car without permission.
Tom fell in love with the preacher\'s daughter.
I saw a woman who I thought was Mary\'s mother.
Tom says he\'s going to go to Boston with Mary.
It was actually a lot more fun than I expected.
Don\'t ask me so many questions. Use your head.
Don\'t ask me to choose between you and my job.
Don\'t ever compare your wife to another woman.
Either Tom doesn\'t want to do it or he can\'t.
I always brush my teeth after eating breakfast.
You look even more beautiful than I remembered.
You might be the only one here who can do that.
You might learn something if you pay attention.
You must not get off the train before it stops.
Tom took off his watch and put it on the table.
